data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Batman, Turkey.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Batman, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 205 believers in Batman that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Batman, Turkey to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Batman, Turkey.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, North Iraqi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, North Iraqi people.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Batman, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 547,600 people living in Batman.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Batman to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Batman
location.people_groups_list: Jew, Turkish, Kurd, Kurmanji, Abkhaz, Chechen, Hemshin
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jew, Turkish (5,500), Kurd, Kurmanji (2,200), Abkhaz (164,000), Chechen (112,000), Hemshin (22,000)
